page.title: 09The Talbot Hotel
page.content: There are 39 bedrooms and 38 people who work in the hotel. The front of the hotel is very old. On the stairs is the mark of the ring of Mary Queen of Scots. It is thought that the staircase came from Fotheringhay Castle when it was knocked down. There is a picture of Mary Queen of the Scots on the wall. She had a black dress with eyes on it when she was executed. There are five conference rooms. The bedrooms are very nice and they have a radio and T.V. and private bathroom and there are notices that you can put on your bedroom door saying what time you want your breakfast.
